alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Ness; Rush; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 5:39PM CDT until April 29 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ness County in west central Kansas... Trego County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Rush County in central Kansas... Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 539 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Collyer to near Trego Center to McCracken, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ogallah around 545 PM CDT. Wakeeney and Riga around 550 PM CDT. Ellis and Liebenthal around 555 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Schoenchen, Antonino, Munjor, Toulon, Victoria and Walker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
